header_text: You're meeting a friend at a local park. After 20 minutes, your friend still hasn't arrived. You think they probably are coming.

elements.Text: Did your friend stand you up?

elements.name: You're meeting a friend at a local park. After 20 minutes, your friend still hasn't arrived. You think they probably are coming._Social Situations_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
